title: New: Avaberée – Running Out
content:
Hey, guess where Avaberée are from? Yep, you guessed it, Australia.

This trio of perfect pop princesses (Aimee Cavanagh, Genevieve Bufalino and Irena Lysiuk) are set to take blogs by storm with their recent single Running Out. So it’s definitely right in line with the current ‘in’ sound; slightly delirious, sugary synth pop, but don’t let that distract you from what is a fantastically crafted pop song. Listen to Running Out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
